website_summaries.verdict: A cold-pressed, natural oil that works well for skin and hair treatments, but avoid using it for cooking due to conflicting information.
pros: Oil is cold pressed, 100% pure, and unrefined
Comes with a pump, so you can control the amount that you use
cons: Confusion over whether it is food grade or not
the description says yes, but the bottle ships with a "For external use only" warning

customer_reviews.title: My new go to oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing! I've used others on my 4c natural hair, but they did not leave it feeling so moisturized! The pump makes using it very easy and it only takes one to two pumps to cover all of my hair. There isn't a strong odor to it and it keeps my hair soft and shiny for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Maryocean

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! No smell, absorbs well, though still 'oily' so you can't immediately touch things/sit on furniture/clothes etc. I've been using it for a lot of skincare & mixing it into lotions. Pump works perfectly - not sure about leaks, pumping oil means I sometimes drip a little but haven't noticed it leaking on its own- but it functions easily and so many pumps break or just don't work. This is something I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Colbert Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Clean, goes on smoothly and seems to be good quality. [continues to be a good product: clean and easy to apply and it works - update on 8/9/2017] [great product! still use. - update on 1/13/2018]
customer_reviews.author: R. Callicotte

customer_reviews.title: A desert-island item!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This avocado oil is outstanding! I have been using it on my face and body, and it is an excellent anti-aging moisturizer. When I use it under makeup, I apply it lightly, then blot my face with a tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A.

customer_reviews.title: Great moisture
customer_reviews.text: This oil is just amazing sheer enough to use daily on my face as a moisturizer yet is not greasy . It mixes easily with fragrances as a carrier oil. One of the best oils I have ever used
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Newman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality of oils
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality of oils! I have purchased several from this seller and I have never been disappointed. I did travel with them about a month ago and they leaked everywhere but I can deal with that because they are so amazing. Great for oil cleansing your face
customer_reviews.author: Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience.
customer_reviews.text: I had used this oil on my face in the past. I used the new bottle before going to an outdoor memorial service. On the long drive there, my eyes were burning so badly, I had to stop and buy some eye drops. Then, at the cemetery, the gnats swarmed my head, face, eyes, so bad, I had to pull my face mask up over my eyes, nose and mouth. No one else was bothered by the gnats. Horrible experience. I hope to return this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Pattywolford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, true to description
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, true to description, arrived in perfect condition and timely! I am highly allergic to many ingredients in products along with all nuts and some fruits, so you can imagine how difficult it is to purchase products! Avocado oil was recommended and Sky Organics products checked all my boxes - 100% avocado oil, cold-pressed, organic, etc. I purchased and tested on my hand ... no allergic reaction and it left my skin soft and smooth YAY! Can't wait to use it in all ways recommended. Great product and seems like great company so far :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great in DIY items
customer_reviews.text: I love making my own skin care products and roller balls. This is a nice edition to my collection. Smell is not over powering. My skin and hair respond well to this product.
customer_reviews.author: charleagh2525

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! The first time I put it on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! The first time I put it on my skin it felt like it was going to leave oily residue. However it absorbed very quickly into my skin and is now one of my favorite products to use! It's great to put on right out of the shower. Leaves your skin feeling soft, moisturized, and smooth all day. I am going to start trying some essential oil's, and I am convinced this will be a great carrier oil.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.MartuseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I like the pump
customer_reviews.text: This is a great avocado oil and I love the pump. I keep it next to the sink, and use it like hand lotion. I also use it as a makeup remover, followed by witch hazel, then again to nourish my face. It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave skin feeling greasy. It has made a remarkable difference in my skin—hands as well as face. Note: you have to learn to be gentle with the pump—it comes out quickly! I use this one for cosmetic purposes and a different one for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Mael

customer_reviews.title: Great light but moisturizing oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil! Olive and coconut oil make my skin break out. Jojoba doesn't help much when it's actually dry, so this is the perfect in between. It absorbs pretty quickly and doesn't clog my pores like the heavier oils. Great natural moisturizer. I'm really pale and have also had good experiences using it as sunscreen so far. Supposedly it's like spf 15. It's worked for a couple hours at a time in the sun where I'd normally get red.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: It works good on my hair the first day I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: its ok after I use it on my face and I wash my face later my face feels very dry. It works good on my hair the first day I used it my hair felt dry as well. its not something you want to use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Avocado oil by Sky Organics 100% pure organic for skin, hair etc. Non scented!
customer_reviews.text: Love avocado organic moisturizing oil for skin, hair, lips, face and making (Diy) cosmetic products! It's natural and without perfumes which is very important to me as I have very sensitive skin...that's why I love Sky Organics 100% Pure Organic Products!
customer_reviews.author: 209LynnG

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS. I recently had to make the switch ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS. I recently had to make the switch from argan and almond oil because my boyfriend has a severe nut allergy. I have really thick hair that has great body but when its humid its just big and frizzy. I use two pumps of this in my hair about every four days on clean dry hair and its make my hair so shinny, sleek, and beautiful. After a month of using it my hair has just sat nicer and my ends look so much healthier. Also great product for skin moisture too!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Soaks in nicely
customer_reviews.text: Sky Organics Avocado Oil is a moisturizing oil. It soaks into skin and cleared up my flakey, dry skin. I will continue to use this throughout the year. Blends well after a shower while the pores are still open. No smell that I noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Advertising Does Not Match Labeling
customer_reviews.text: I just received this order and I am returning it promptly. I was buying this oil for cooking as stated on Amazon. When I received the bottles, the label states "for external use only". The advertising must be changed to reflect the labeling. For those who claim that it can be used for cooking/oral use should not be doing so. As someone who has been working in the pharmaceutical industry for over 26 years, there is a reason why there is an "external use only" label on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: mscott2112

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Gréât for everything. Decent sized bottle too. Comes with a pump. I use it in my hair and on my skin. It’s light weight and not much of a scent which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: koko

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. The skin around my eyes (and hands) gets really dry in winter, and I read that avocado oil is a great moisturizer, so I decided to try it out. I put the oil around my eyes before bed and I would also add the oil into hand lotions. Once I started using the oil around my eyes at night, the dryness went away. Awesome product thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a hair oil and skin moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I use this avocado oil on my hair and really love it. It makes my hair so shiny, soft, and healthy. I also like to use it as a moisturizer after I shower. Just be careful with the bottle if you use the pump. The slightest squeeze of the bottle will cause the oil to come shooting out of the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: excellent skin oil for soft and radiant skin
customer_reviews.text: A lovely organic body oil. I've been using this for 2 months. My winter skin soaks it up and is much softer. There is no scent (you could add your own organic essential oil(s), but I like it as it is.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I was using sweet almond oil for my dry skin but it wasn’t working all that well so I decided to switch to avocado oil and My dry skin is really loving it. I only need to apply very little and my skin stays soft for a few days before I have to apply it again. I also started using it on my face at night time and when I wake up in the am my face is baby skin soft. I definitely recommend it for those with dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kristeen Ho

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy !!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying this product and I must say I will buy again. I love this product it makes my skin super soft and a little goes a Long way ! My skin stays moisturized throughout the whole day with just one use . And I love how it comes with two different tops. I prefere the pump because a lot can come out with just a little tap .
customer_reviews.author: Kiala George

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Addicted, this is so much better than coconut oil. It’s so nice after shaving or just a hot shower. Leaves my skin feeling buttery for days.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann Mistretta

customer_reviews.title: Avocado oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the third bottle I got from amazon. I think it’s very good. I use it on my hair after washing it. But you can use it for multiple things, even drinking it. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: This Abocado oil is not cold pressed
customer_reviews.text: What I don't like about this product is the quality, it's not cold pressed

customer_reviews.title: neat presentation
customer_reviews.text: Great aroma, high quality. Even came with a handy pump for ease of use. I used what I needed for what I was making and gifted the rest to my daughter... She is impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Organic and cold pressed
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. The scent is subtle and works great for mixing with my essential oils. Love the it comes with a pump most come as a squeeze and that’s really hard when trying to put into a capsule or in the shower to apply my head.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It's edible!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy avocado oil and since I feel in love with sky organics I thought I would try this one. Love it

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was for cooking and disappointed when I read it was not
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was for cooking and disappointed when I read it was not. But I use it now for my skin and it is fine. Works well for me and no allergy problems or anything which is great since I react to so many things.

customer_reviews.text: First time using avacado oil as a moisturizer. The oil soaks in to your skin to leave it soft and not at all greasy. Appears to be good quality, will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve Found
customer_reviews.text: I use it in a bodywork practice...the best I’ve found and no mess with the pump

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Option
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil, prefer cold pressed but love that it"s not an oil that hampers my health. I'm one of those recent vegan converts.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle oil!
customer_reviews.text: I have acne and after using intense creams on my face recommended by my dermatologist my super was super dry and flaky, which was fine because they told me this would happen using retin-a and duac. I originally ordered this oil for something totally different but after reading so many great things about it and it's amazing benefits I decided to try it on my face. Terrified that it might make my skin worse like coconut oil did... turns out, my face is amazing now! Scars are looking faded and my skin is soft. The acne is also going away little by little and my face is happy! Love this oil!
customer_reviews.author: Jannel B

customer_reviews.title: Will have to wait and see.
customer_reviews.text: We are using this oil for dry patches on my 2 1/2 year old as well as my hands. We just started using this, so I imagine that it may take a more rigorous routine of applications before we see major results.
customer_reviews.author: katherine cuevas fuentes

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was for consuming, I was putting it on my dog's food !!!

product_meta.title: Avocado Oil by Sky Organics (8oz) 100% Pure Natural & Cold-Pressed Avocado Oil - Ideal for Massage Cooking and Aromatherapy - Rich in Vitamin E & Oleic Acid
feature_bullets: Contains: 1 x 8 fl oz. bottle of Avocado Oil by Sky Organics

100% Pure & Expeller-pressed: Sky Organics Avocado Oil is 100% pure and expeller-pressed to maintain the oil’s essential beauty benefits. Our Avocado Oil contains zero added ingredients, fragrance, mineral oil, silicone, parabens, and phthalates.
Natural Skin Moisturizer: Avocado Oil is a natural source of nourishing fatty acids and antioxidants that deeply moisturize dry skin types and to keep skin looking hydrated and smooth.
Multipurpose Beauty Essential: Use Sky Organics 100% pure Avocado Oil as a face and moisturizer for dry skin, natural massage oil, deep conditioning hair mask, or in DIY beauty projects!
Responsibly Made: Our Avocado Oil is responsibly sourced and 100% vegan and cruelty-free.
